General.Name: Sinomag Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Sinomag Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of permanent ferrite and commutator products. Its products are used in the automobile, transportation, home appliance, electric tool, fitness equipment, and other markets. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
General.Address: Building 1, Swan Lake Wanda Plaza, Hefei, China, 230011
